name: Fill a contact us registration form using mandatory fields

testSteps.description: Example: {subject=Webmaster, email=johan@sofka.com, message=Esto es una prueba}

children.description: Given the user is on landing page of automationpractice
When him browse to contact us

And him has filled it and submitted
| subject | Webmaster |
| email | johan@sofka.com |
| message | Esto es una prueba |
Then the user will see a confirmation message.

userStory.narrative:
As an automation tester
    I need to practice automation testing using Screenplay patter
    for learn about serenity BDD framework

title: Fill a contact us registration form using mandatory fields

scenarioOutline:
Given the user is on landing page of automationpractice
When him browse to contact us
And him has filled it and submitted
|subject | <subject>|
|email | <email>|
|message | <message>|
Then the user will see a confirmation message.
